thread.title: Derrick Craine matches a career-high with 3 TD runs to lead Chattanooga over Furman 31-3
thread.title_full: Derrick Craine matches a career-high with 3 TD runs to lead Chattanooga over Furman 31-3

title: Derrick Craine matches a career-high with 3 TD runs to lead Chattanooga over Furman 31-3
text:
Derrick Craine matches a career-high with 3 TD runs to lead Chattanooga over Furman 31-3 THE ASSOCIATED PRESS  44  44   
Subjects: 
Tennessee (480) 
CHATTANOOGA, Tennessee — Derrick Craine matched a career-high with three rushing touchdowns and Chattanooga beat Furman 31-3 on Saturday. 
Craine ran for 138 yards on 21 carries to lead the Mocs (4-1, 2-0 Southern Conference) to their fourth-straight victory. 
Craine scored twice from the 4-yard line, and Lucas Webb scored on 35-yard interception return to give Chattanooga a 21-3 halftime lead. 
Furman (3-3, 1-1) had a 14-play, 72-yard drive stall when Sema'je Kendall intercepted Paladin quarterback Reese Hannon midway through the fourth quarter. The Mocs sealed it when Craine added another 4-yard score to cap a 94-yard drive that took up nearly eight minutes. 
Jacob Huesman was 9 of 15 for 104 yards passing and ran for 79 yards. Henrique Ribeiro kicked a 36-field goal in the third quarter for the Mocs. 
Jon Croft Hollingsworth kicked a 25-yard field goal on the opening drive for the Paladins.
